articles.title: Premier Inspects Industrial Establishments
articles.content:
Premier Inspects Industrial Establishments
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, made a field survey of the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex and the East Pyongyang Thermal Power Plant.
					 Going round various parts of the complex, he encouraged workers there in a vigorous drive to put the production on a normal footing.
					
					 The field consultative meeting discussed the issue of further perfecting the Juche iron and steel-making technology and drastically increasing the iron production and underscored the need for relevant units to satisfactorily supply raw and other materials for the normal production.
					
					 At the power plant, the premier called for stepping up the scientific researches into increasing the electricity production and for keeping production going through meticulous equipment and technical management.

articles.title: Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Leaves
articles.content:
Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Leaves
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star led by Ko Tok U, chairman of the Nishi Tokyo Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, left here Saturday.

articles.title: Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Leaves
articles.content:
Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Leaves
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- An art troupe of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star headed by Ha Yong Su left here Saturday.

articles.title: Best Scientists and Technicians of State for 2017 Selected
articles.content:
Best Scientists and Technicians of State for 2017 Selected
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Five persons were selected as the best scientists and technicians of the state for Juche 106 (2017) in the DPRK.
					 According to an official concerned, they played key role in achieving distinguished sci-tech successes conducive to sci-tech and economic development and the improvement of people's living standard.
					
					 Dr. Rim Chang Ho, head of the Medical Sci-tech Exchange Company of Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University, made a great contribution to developing visual electrodiagnostic testing system.
					
					 Dr. and Associate Prof. Choe Tong Il, head of the Machine Designing Institute of Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering, conducted researches into putting the sanitary goods production process of the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill on unmanned basis and established the unmanned production processes at some units.
					
					 Dr. and Associate Prof. Ryang Ji Song, a researcher of the IT Institute of Kim Chaek University of Technology, presented a new principle and method for developing and introducing a perfect information preserving translation system based on compress representation of a finite structured object.
					
					 Dr., Associate Prof. and Merited Scientist Ri Yong Il, head of the Paper Engineering Institute of the State Academy of Sciences, developed more than 10 kinds of functional paper goods like precision filter tip and high efficiency air filtration paper and completed the multi-functional paper production process.
					
					 Dr., Associate Prof. and Merited Scientist Kim Tok Su, head of the Electric Power System Institute of Kim Chaek University of Technology, suggested a plan for controlling high-speed ski lift of the Masikryong Ski Resort and established electric power control system at the ski resort. He also played a key role in developing the CNC-based load power control system and contributed to establishing the national integrated power control system and putting several industrial establishments on a modern basis.

articles.title: DPRK Young Pianist Plays in Russia
articles.content:
DPRK Young Pianist Plays in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Choe Jang Hung, a student of Pyongyang Music School No.1 of Kim Won Gyun University of Music who grew up as a pianist, appeared on the stage of the performance "Masters of Moscow, Today and Tomorrow" held in Russia on Feb. 18.
					 In the performance he played a piano in company with the National Chamber Orchestra of Russia conducted by People's Artiste of the Soviet Union Vladimir Spivakov, director of the Moscow International Music Hall who is a world-famous conductor and violinist.
					
					 In the past period Choe took the first and special place at the 20th International Juvenile Chopin Piano Contest and the 2nd Moscow International Piano Concours named after Krainev.
					
					 This time, too, he displayed his talent to the full.
					
					 The audience lavished praises for presenting world famous songs with his refined and skillful rendition and rich musical sentiment.
					
					 The audience congratulated him upon his successful play, presenting flowers to him when it was over.

articles.title: Illusion about Imperialists' "Aid" Will Lead to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Illusion about Imperialists' "Aid" Will Lead to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- To expect to get benefit from the "aid" of the imperialists, while pinning hope on it, is little short of pricking one's own eyes with one's own hands, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 The imperialists' "aid" is a noose for plunder and subordination for usurping more from what was given and a tool for realizing their strategy for world domination, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 To hope for "aid" from the imperialists will precisely lead to ruin and to harbor illusion about the imperialists will end up in destruction. This is an iron truth and lesson taught by history. One should never pin hope nor harbor illusion about "aid" from them but maintain Juche character and national identity. This is the only way for defending a country, achieving its prosperity and building earlier a new independent world.
					
					 To build economy in reliance on others while failing to build an independent national economy would never guarantee the independent development of a country and a nation.
					
					 The practical experience of our revolution is a living example proving that only when Juche character and national identity are preserved and strong self-supporting national economy is built, can the sovereignty of a country be defended and the dignity and honor of a nation be glorified.
					
					 We have so far built the self-supporting national economy while maintaining the Juche-oriented line all the time, unperturbed by any pressure.
					
					 That's why we are dynamically advancing toward the final victory of building a powerful socialist nation despite the vicious sanctions and blockade imposed by the imperialists.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Censures U.S. Preparations for Cyber-attack on DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Censures U.S. Preparations for Cyber-attack on DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The Trump administration put all the intelligence agencies on an alert, ordering them to get ready to mount cyber attack prior to the launch of a military attack on the DPRK after working out a plan for it, according to the U.S. magazine Foreign Policy.
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Saturday says that the U.S. preparations for cyber attack on the DPRK clearly reveal once again the despicable nature of the American rogue state as the harasser of reunification, disturber of peace and the chieftain of aggression.
					
					 Urging the U.S. to drop its pipedream to realize its aggression ambition through cyber attack on the DPRK, the commentary goes on:
					
					 The DPRK is an invincible military power acknowledged by the world. We can certainly respond to any war mode wanted by the U.S. as we have everything in place and are ready to cope with anything. 
					
					 If the U.S. finally ignites a train of a war in pursuit of its reckless ambition for the invasion of the DPRK, that will end up in the final ruin of the American empire.
					
					 The U.S. should not run wild, clearly understanding its rival.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts U.S. Preparations for Cyber Attack on DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts U.S. Preparations for Cyber Attack on DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- A recent revelation puts it that the U.S. has secretly been making preparations to mount a large-scale cyber-attack on the DPRK before making a military attack.
					 The February 15th issue of the U.S. magazine Foreign Policy disclosed that the Trump administration put all the intelligence agencies including the CIA and the DIA on a high alert to get them ready to launch a large-scale cyber attack as the first phase of the practical military option toward the DPRK, while countering the nuclear and missile threats from it with "word bomb".
					
					 The magazine also disclosed that the U.S. had pushed forward the preparations for the attack in top secrecy for the past six months in south Korea, Japan and other places, had already invested funds running at billions of U.S. dollars and trained necessary experts, and that the U.S. military intelligence analysts were accordingly put on standby to be followed by the posting of elite Korean peninsula experts to intelligence arms under the DIA.
					
					 CIA Director Pompeo and former and incumbent officials of the U.S. bluffed that the U.S. preparations for the cyber war targeting the Korean peninsula and the intelligence agencies' preparations for the operation have reached the unprecedented level of an all-out charge, adding that the first bullet will be shot by cyber.
					
					 Timed to coincide with this, the NBC, Blumberg News, The Washington Post and other U.S. media have now become vociferous about "cyber terrorism" and "threats" from the DPRK.
					
					 This proves that the U.S. war moves against the DPRK have reached the phase of practical implementation.
					
					 One of the means for the preemptive attack which the U.S. values as much as the nuclear stick and dollars in realizing its hegemonic strategy is the cyber warfare.
					
					 The U.S. has so far poured huge human and material resources on strengthening the cyber war capabilities since the 1990s, considering the cyber space as the fifth area for realizing its world domination after the land, sea, air and space.
					
					 In May 2010 it set up the Cyber Command and in October 2012 it issued the president's secret order to mount a preemptive attack on any country without advance warning, with the mobilization of all means for hacking attack.
					
					 It is not a secret that, under this plan, the U.S. introduced a great number of cyber warfare experts into various types of DPRK-targeted war drills including Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint drills and has systematically conducted the cyber attack drills against the DPRK.
					
					 It is an unpardonable terrorist act and a shameless war provocation for the U.S. to spur the preparations for large-scale cyber attack on the DPRK through even the intelligence agencies.
					
					 For the U.S. to get vociferous about "cyber terrorism" and "hacking" by someone is nothing but shameless sophism aimed to cover up its despicable nature as a hacking empire and kingpin of cyber terrorism and justify its moves for a war against the DPRK.
					
					 Amid the controversy about the resumption of the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises, nuclear war groups including the nuclear carrier have already taken their positions in and around south Korea, ready for advance. Under such situation the U.S. plans to commence even large-scale cyber attack. This proves that the curtain for the second Korean war has already been lifted.
					
					 The U.S. had better judge what horrible consequences it can face in case it fires the first bullet by cyber.
					
					 The DPRK is fully ready to counter any war mode of the U.S. as it has everything in hands and is ready for everything.
					
					 The U.S. should properly understand its rival and should not run amuck.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts U.S. Sophism about "Unification by Communizing South"
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts U.S. Sophism about "Unification by Communizing South"
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The Trump group, which has been vocal about the DPRK's nuclear weapons for self-defence by branding them as a "threat" to the world, is now describing them as the ones for "unification by communizing the south", only to provoke the laughter of the world people.
					 Dan Coats, director of National Intelligence, CIA Director Pompeo and other top officials of the intelligence agencies of the U.S. at official appearances including the congressional hearing said that the DPRK's ultimate goal is to unify Korea by "communizing the south" with use of nuclear weapons.
					
					 McMaster, assistant to the president for National Security of the White House, also said the DPRK's nuclear weapons "aim at intimidation for the purpose of unifying the Korean peninsula under the red flag".
					
					 Commander-in-Chief of the U.S. Armed Forces in the Pacific Harris, who has been designated as the U.S. ambassador to Australia, claimed at the House of Representatives Armed Services Committee that the DPRK's nuclear possession is for "reunifying the Korean peninsula under the communist system" and that even though dialogue is held with it, a focus must be set on removing nuclear weapons from the Korean peninsula.
					
					 What matters is that this sophism was presented at a time when there is widespread opinion in the international community that the DPRK's nuclear possession is a decisive option taken due to the U.S. nuclear threat and hostile policy and at a time when there opened a dramatic phase for reconciliation on the Korean peninsula thanks to the proactive measure taken by the DPRK in the new year, in particular.
					
					 In a word, the sophism is a card played as last-ditch efforts, being upset by the development. The signboard of "unification by communizing the south" was the one oft-repeated by the south Korean conservative group.
					
					 This eloquently proves the wretched situation of the U.S.
					
					 Clear is its aim. It seeks to brand the DPRK's nuclear weapons as the ones for "unifying Korea by communizing the south", justify arms buildup in and around the Korean peninsula, incite hostility toward the DPRK in south Korea and chill the atmosphere for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations under the pretext of "protecting" its alleged ally south Korea.
					
					 But the U.S. is gravely mistaken.
					
					 The DPRK's state nuclear force never targets the fellow countrymen as it is the strategic asset common to the nation for guaranteeing the peace and security on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It will be enough to provoke laughter to think that the DPRK built the nuclear force and even have had access to the inter-continental ballistic missile, risking everything just to put palm-size south Korea only under its nose under control.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear weapons are targeted against the U.S. and if the U.S. shows even the slightest sign of provocation, the whole U.S. mainland will face resolute and merciless nuclear blow.
					
					 The Trump group had better understand its position and make a wise option of withdrawing the hostile policy toward the DPRK before provoking the laughter of the world.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Rejects Resumption of War Exercises
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Rejects Resumption of War Exercises
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea reportedly held a rally outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Feb. 21 against the resumption of the joint military exercises against the north.
					 At the rally the speakers denounced the U.S. for calling for the resumption while not easing sanctions and pressure on the north.
					
					 The resumption of the drills would pose the danger of a nuclear war as last year, they deplored.
					
					 They urged the U.S. to stop at once sanctions and pressure and military action against the north, stressing that they would never help settle the "north's nuclear issue".
					
					 They called upon all citizens to launch a candlelight action for peace against war at the Kwanghwamun plaza on March 24.

articles.title: S. Korean Dissident Party Opposes Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
S. Korean Dissident Party Opposes Joint Military Drills
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the People's Democratic Party of south Korea stressed on Feb. 21 that the joint military exercises disrupting the relations between the south and the north should never be held, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Minjok Ilbo.
					 He charged that Defense Minister Song Yong Mu on Feb. 20 clarified that Key Resolve and Foal Eagle would be resumed at the end of the Winter Olympics.
					
					 He also denounced that the U.S. forces commander in south Korea in his report to the U.S. House of Representatives on Feb. 14 stated the joint military exercises with south Korea would be held every year.
					
					 The Trump administration has escalated tensions on the Korean peninsula, consistently pursuing the "hostile policy toward" the DPRK during the Olympics, he said, adding: The resumption of the exercises beset with the danger of a nuclear war on the peninsula will derail the improvement of the south-north relations.
					
					 The authorities are just repeating the words that "they hope to see the south-north dialogue leading to the denuclearization dialogue between the U.S. and the north", he said, urging the authorities never to hold the joint military drills.

articles.title: S. Korean Newspaper Calls for Resolutely Countering Trump's Economic Pressure
articles.content:
S. Korean Newspaper Calls for Resolutely Countering Trump's Economic Pressure
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Minjok Ilbo in an editorial on Feb. 22 urged the authorities to resolutely counter Trump's economic pressure and provocation.
					 The U.S. economic pressure on south Korea gets more serious due to Trump's "America-first" policy, the editorial said, adding:
					
					 The U.S. Department of Commerce is taking practical steps following Trump's remarks in reference to the south Korea-U.S. "Free Trade Agreement" that it was a very bad deal, the agreement was a disaster and that it will be scrapped if it brings no results even though it is now under renegotiations.
					
					 The south Korean economy is now reeling under the U.S. steps.
					
					 This proves that the south Korea-U.S. alliance is only a signboard and the south Korean economy is strictly under the control of the U.S. 
					
					 The editorial urged the "government" to rely on the masses and resolutely counter Trump's pressure and provocation.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Urges Total Repeal of "Law on Supervision for Public Peace"
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Urges Total Repeal of "Law on Supervision for Public Peace"
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People in an editorial on Feb. 22 demanded the total repeal of the "law on supervision for public peace".
					 Terming it an evil law dating back to the dictatorial regime and a typical law against human rights, the editorial stressed that this law should have already been abolished and now is the time to completely repeal it.

articles.title: Japanese Right-wing Roughs Take Potshots at Chongryon Central Hall
articles.content:
Japanese Right-wing Roughs Take Potshots at Chongryon Central Hall
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Japanese right-wing roughs committed an act of terrorism by taking potshots at the Central Hall of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) in Tokyo on Feb. 23.
					 At dawn that day two gangsters, who got off a black car before the hall and hanged around there, sprayed bullets into the gate and were arrested while fleeing.
					
					 According to the confirmation of the case, the chief plotter is Satoshi Katsurada, who drove the car, and the shooter is Yoshinori Kawamura.
					
					 Satoshi Katsurada is reportedly a diehard right-wing extremist terrorist who was once deputy head of a Japanese right-wing organization. His stooge Yoshinori Kawamura was the ringleader of a gang of roughs and his present regular job is to perpetrate terrorism.
					
					 When those terrorists were arrested by the police, several rightist gangs of Japan thronged into the Chongryon Central Hall, raising a disturbance.
					
					 The said crime is not an accident but an intolerable reckless act against the DPRK and the Koreans in Japan. It was a deliberate act of terrorism of the right-wing gang timed to coincide with the enforcement of the provocative anti-DPRK tough policy by the Abe group and the creation of the gruesome climate of the daily-escalating suppression of Chongryon.

articles.title: Chongryon Blasts Terrorism of Japanese Right-wing Gangsters
articles.content:
Chongryon Blasts Terrorism of Japanese Right-wing Gangsters
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), called a press conference at the Central Hall of Chongryon in Tokyo on Friday as regards terrorism by Japanese right-wing gangsters.
					 Present there were media persons of Chongryon, Japan and south Korea.
					
					 The vice-chairman made public a statement at the conference.
					
					 The statement branded the terrorism against Chongryon as an unpardonable challenge to the DPRK and the Korean residents in Japan.
					
					 The Chongryon Central Standing Committee resolutely denounces such sordid terrorism in the name of all Koreans in Japan, it stressed.
					
					 The recent shooting spree is not simply an accident but a planned crime committed against the background of the Japanese authority's hostile policy toward the DPRK and Chongryon, the statement pointed out.
					
					 It said that the Japanese authority can never evade the blame for failing to prevent such terrorism.
					
					 The statement strongly demanded that the Japanese authority bring the two criminals to heavy punishment and inquire into the hidden circumstances of the case and take proper measures to prevent the reoccurrence of such case.
					
					 Then, he answered questions put by reporters.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Delegation of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Delegation of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China presented a letter to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un on Feb. 21.
					 For them living in an alien land, the motherland is the warm embrace of leader Kim Jong Il that they want to go under even in dream, the letter said.
					
					 Whenever recalling the revolutionary life of Kim Jong Il, they come to keenly feel what a great man they had upheld as their leader, it noted, adding:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un identical to the fatherly general is standing in the van of the Juche revolution today.
					
					 Busy as you were leading the cause of the Juche revolution, you looked after with paternal love us, members of the delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China who came to the homeland on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, so that we would not feel even the slightest inconvenience.
					
					 On our return journey after our unforgettable visit to the homeland, we are full of pledge to further strengthen the General Association, a patriotic heritage left by the great Generalissimos, bearing in mind the warm loving care and solicitude shown by you for us.
					
					 The letter stressed that the Koreans in China will remain unchanged in their will to keep to the path of loyalty to repay for the kindness given to them, true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un, no matter how harsh the tempest in the alien land might be.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Algeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Algeria
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The Tarzalt Publishing House in El-Djezair of Algeria on Feb. 6 brought out in booklet leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People" on the occasion of his birth anniversary, the Day of the Shining Star.
					 The work, published on Oct. 3, Juche 79 (1990), deals with the idea that the party's leadership is a decisive guarantee for the victory of the socialist cause, the issue of developing the Workers' Party of Korea into a Juche-type revolutionary party and the basic way for the WPK to discharge its mission and duty as a leading political organization.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Regional Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Regional Body
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The African Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People headquartered in Nigeria on Feb. 7 posted on its website the full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Concluding Speech at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea" to mark the 70th birthday of the Korean People's Army.
					 The work, published on March 31, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the validity of the new strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force set forth by the WPK and the reason why the Party adopted this line.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries between Feb. 7 and 16 to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 There were Kimjongilia show and book and photo exhibition in Russia and Mongolia and visit to the Kimilsungia greenhouse in Guinea.
					
					 Displayed at their venues were photos showing the revolutionary careers and feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also flowers of the sun in full bloom, works of the peerlessly great men and books and photos introducing the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The director of the Bureau for International Cooperation of the Maritime Territory Administration of Russia said Kim Jong Il is a great man and a world-famous statesman recognized by mankind and that the sacred marks he left in Vladivostok City are kept in the hearts of the Russian people.
					
					 The secretary of the Regional Political Council of the Maritime Territorial Branch of the United Russian Party stressed that the feats of Kim Jong Il who put the dignity and national strength of the DPRK on the highest stage would remain forever.
					
					 The chairman of the Kimjongilia Association of Mongolia said that they would make a positive contribution to the development of the friendly relations between the two countries by organizing Kimjongilia shows on important occasions in the future, too.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association of Guinea said that Kim Jong Il is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and the world progressives with the immortal flower Kimjongilia.
					
					 The secretary to the minister of Higher Education and Scientific Research of Guinea said that the Korean people are a happy people blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation and their future is rosy as they have another illustrious leader.

articles.title: Seminar on Juche Idea Held in India
articles.content:
Seminar on Juche Idea Held in India
Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- An Indian national seminar on the Juche idea took place in New Delhi on Feb. 9 under the theme of "The Basic Key to World Peace - Equality and Emancipation" on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Attending it were personages of the Society for the Study of Kim Jong Il's Works, the Juche Philosophy Study Committee, the Delhi State Government and University of Delhi in India, the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea and the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) and followers of the Juche idea.
					
					 Present on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to India and his embassy officials.
					
					 Harish Gupta, director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea who is vice-director general of the IIJI, made a keynote report at the seminar before speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers praised the ideo-theoretical feats of leader Kim Jong Il who developed in depth the Juche idea, founded by President Kim Il Sung, into the guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 They said that the reality of the DPRK, which is dynamically advancing towards a socialist power despite the ceaseless challenges and extreme sanctions and pressure of the imperialist allied forces, clearly proves the validity and vitality of the Juche idea.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's famous works including "On the Juche Idea" and "Socialism Is a Science" serve as priceless ideological and theoretical pabulum and an inspiring banner for the progressives advocating independence, they stressed.
					
					 They noted that he firmly defended socialism with the treasured sword of Songun in the period of unprecedented ordeals and put the DPRK on the position of a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The DPRK is a beacon of hope giving great strength and courage to the progressive people aspiring after equality, emancipation, peace and justice, they stressed.
					
					 A letter to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: DPRK's Significant Days Marked in Bulgaria
articles.content:
DPRK's Significant Days Marked in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association issued a bulletin to mark the 76th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The bulletin introduced the immortal ideo-theoretical feats and Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il, stressing that his feats for the Korean revolution and the world revolution will shine forever with his august name.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Il Sung founded the KPA, regular revolutionary armed forces, on Feb. 8, 1948.
					
					 Under his leadership the young KPA repelled the sudden invasion by the U.S. and won a brilliant victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Today the KPA is reliably protecting socialist Korea, holding respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in high esteem as its Supreme Commander.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju averigua en terreno las gestiones de las unidades importantes
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju averigua en terreno las gestiones de las unidades importantes
Pyongyang, 24 de febrero (ACNC) -- Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, averiguo en el terreno las gestiones del Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae y la Central Termoelectrica de Pyongyang Este.
					 Estando en varios puntos de la primera unidad, estimulo a los obreros que se esfuerzan por la normalizacion de la produccion.
					
					 En la reunion consultiva convocada en el terreno, se dio enfasis a la necesidad de perfeccionar la propia tecnica de funcion de hierro para aumentar la produccion de hierro y se discutieron los problemas de medida para que las unidades relacionadas suministren las materias primas y los materiales necesarios para la normalizacion de la produccion.
					
					 Recorriendo la segunda unidad, el premier subrayo la necesidad de profundizar la investigacion cientifica para incrementar la produccion de electricidad y de esmerarse en la administracion de equipos y tecnica para poner en pleno funcionamiento.

articles.title: ACNC comenta tentativas de guerra cibernetica de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ACNC comenta tentativas de guerra cibernetica de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 24 de febrero (ACNC) -- Se conocio que EE.UU. impulsa sigilosamente en estos dias los preparativos para asestar el ataque cibernetico de gran dimension antes de iniciar la ofensiva militar contra la RPDC.
					La revista norteamericana Foreign Policy revelo el dia 15 que la administracion Trump dio la orden de movilizacion general a la CIA, la DIA y otros organos de inteligencia para ejecutar el ataque cibernetico como primera etapa de la opcion militar anticoreana respondiendo al mismo tiempo con la "bomba verbal" a la amenaza nuclear y de misiles del Norte de Corea.
					
					Anadio que durante 6 meses pasados, EE.UU. vino impulsando en supersecreto los preparativos correspondientes en el Sur de Corea y Japon asignando miles de millones de US$, inclusive la formacion de los especialistas necesarios. 
					
					Continuo que los analistas de informaciones de las fuerzas norteamericanas se pusieron en el estado de espera de la movilizacion emergente mientras los especialistas de elite en el problema de la Peninsula Coreana se ubican en el servicio de inteligencia de la DIA.
					
					El director de la CIA, Pompeo, y otros funcionarios retirados y en servicio de EE.UU. chismean que marchan en el nivel de movilizacion general casi sin precedentes los preparativos de los organos de inteligencia, enfocados en la Peninsula Coreana, y su primera bala se tirara por el espacio cibernetico.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, NBC, Blumberg News, Washington Post y otros medios de prensa norteamericanos informan con griteria sobre el supuesto "terrorismo cibernetico" y la "amenaza" de la RPDC.
					
					Los hechos dejan en claro que estan en plena marcha los preparativos de EE.UU. para la guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					Para realizar su estrategia hegemonica, el imperio americano concede mayor prioridad a la guerra cibernetica, al igual que el garrote nuclear y el dolar. 
					
					Tomo el espacio cibernetico como el quinto para la hegemonia mundial junto con la tierra, mar, cielo y cosmos y desde la decada de 1990 hasta la fecha, vino invirtiendo fabulosos recursos humanos y materiales para mejorar la capacidad de guerra cibernetica.
					
					Organizo en mayo de 2010 la comandancia cibernetica y emitio en octubre de 2012 la orden secreta del presidente que permitio movilizar todos los medios en el hacking y atacar de modo sorpresivo a cualesquier paises sin advertencia previa.
					
					Ya no es secreto que tuvieron lugar sistematicamente los simulacros de ataque cibernetico contra la RPDC con la incorporacion de un gran numero de especialistas durante los entrenamientos de guerra tales como Key Resolve y Foal Eagle.
					
					Los preparativos de ataque cibernetico constituyen un intolerable acto terrorista y descarado crimen de provocacion de guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					Las retoricas de EE.UU. como "terrorismo cibernetico" y "hacking" de alguien no son mas que una sofisteria descarada para encubrir su naturaleza de imperio de hacking y caudillo de ciber-terrorismo y justificar sus maniobras para la guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea.
					
					El intento de ataque cibernetico de EE.UU. coincide con el anuncio de reinicio de los ejercicios militares con el Sur de Corea y el despliegue de portaaviones y otros medios de guerra nuclear en las posiciones de salida en el Sur de Corea y su contorno, hecho que testimonia que ya se abrio el telon de la segunda guerra coreana. 
					
					A EE.UU. le convendria meditar primero sobre las consecuencias catastroficas que emanen de su ataque cibernetico. 
					
					La RPDC, dotada de lo todo, esta bien preparada para responder a cualquier tipo de guerra que desee el imperio americano. 
					
					EE.UU. debe actuar con prudencia al ver bien a su rival.

articles.title: ACNC comenta sofisteria de "unificacion apoyado en el comunismo"
articles.content:
ACNC comenta sofisteria de "unificacion apoyado en el comunismo"
Pyongyang, 24 de febrero (ACNC) -- La banda de Trump, que se rasgaba las vestiduras calificando de "amenaza" sobre el mundo las armas nucleares autodefensivas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, hace reir a la gente en estos dias con su repentino sofisma de que esas armas son "medio para la unificacion mediante el comunismo".
					 Hace poco, el director de Inteligencia Nacional, Dan Coats, el director de la CIA, Pompeo, y otros jefes de los servicios de inteligencia de EE.UU. declararon en la audiencia del Congreso y otros lugares publicos que "la meta final del Norte de Corea es lograr la unificacion mediante el comunismo a traves del uso de armas nucleares".
					
					  El asesor de seguridad nacional de la Casa Blanca, McMaster, tambien chismeo que "las armas nucleares del Norte sirven de medio de amenaza para unificar la Peninsula Coreana bajo la bandera roja".
					
					  El comandante en jefe de las fuerzas norteamericanas en el Pacifico, Harris, nominado como embajador estadounidense en Australia, dijo en el Comite Militar de la Camara de Representantes que el objetivo de la posesion de armas nucleares por parte del Norte de Corea reside en "reunificar la Peninsula Coreana bajo el regimen comunista" y "aunque se abra el dialogo con el Norte, es necesario dar su enfoque en eliminar sin falta las armas nucleares en la Peninsula Coreana".
					
					  Ahora, en la sociedad internacional se elevan las voces afirmativas de que la posesion de armas nucleares de la RPDC deviene la resuelta opcion escogida frente a la amenaza nuclear y la politica hostil de EE.UU.
					
					Ademas, se abre este ano la dramatica coyuntura de reconciliacion en la Peninsula Coreana gracias a la iniciativa de la RPDC.
					
					En tales circunstancias, EE.UU. saco la ultima carta que es el sofisma de "unificacion basado en el comunismo" que solian mencionar los conservadores surcoreanos. 
					
					Este hecho demuestra bien la situacion miserable e incomoda de EE.UU. 
					
					  Su intencion consiste en justificar el aumento de fuerzas armadas agresoras en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno bajo el pretexto de defender a su "aliado", el Sur de Corea, al calificar el arma nuclear de la RPDC de "medio para la unificacion a la manera comunista". Igualmente, persigue el objetivo de romper el ambiente de mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas al inculcar la hostilidad anti-RPDC en el Sur de Corea.
					
					  Las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC son la propiedad estrategica comun de la nacion coreana para garantizar la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y no toman jamas por su blanco a la parte connacional.
					
					  Cualquier persona se reiria ironicamente si le dice que la RPDC construyo las fuerzas armadas nucleares y preparo hasta el ICBM pagando un precio muy caro para ocupar simplemente el pequeno territorio surcoreano.
					
					  Esas armas apuntan de punta a cabo a EE.UU. y si este se atreve a abrir el fuego, todo su territorio sera la victima del implacable ataque nuclear.
					
					  Antes de que caiga en el peor atolladero, la camarilla de Trump debe conocer bien su situacion y tomar la opcion sensata de cancelar su politica hostil anticoreana.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena la ambicion de ataque cibernetico de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena la ambicion de ataque cibernetico de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 24 de febrero (ACNC) -- Segun el reciente reporte de Foreign Policy, la administracion Trump planeo asestar el ataque cibernetico de gran envergadura antes de iniciar el golpe militar contra la RPDC y dio la orden de movilizacion general a todos los organos de inteligencia.
					 Ese plan vuelve a demostrar claramente la asquerosa fachada del Estado gangster de America como estropeador de la reunificacion de Corea, destructor de la paz y caudillo de la agresion.
					
					  Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 24 y prosigue:
					
					  EE.UU. debe abandonar su necio intento de realizar la ambicion agresiva contra la RPDC mediante el ataque cibernetico. 
					
					  La RPDC es la invencible potencia militar, reconocida por todo el mundo, y esta preparada a cualquier forma de guerra que desee EE.UU.
					
					  Si EE.UU. provoca por fin la guerra anti-RPDC, tendra el resultado final que sera la destruccion definitiva del imperio americano.
					
					  EE.UU. debe portarse con juicio y control al darse cuenta con quien se enfrenta.
